description.en: Control your SmartThings devices with Unfolded Circle Remote

value.en:
1. Go to https://account.smartthings.com/tokens
2. Click 'Generate new token'
3. Select these permissions:
   ✅ Devices: List + See + Control all devices
   ✅ Locations: See all locations
   ✅ Installed Applications: List + See + Manage all installed apps
   ✅ Scenes: List + See + Control all scenes
   ✅ Rules: See + Control all rules
   ✅ Custom Capabilities: Read all capabilities
   ✅ Device Profiles: See all device profiles
4. Copy the token and paste it above
